content: The medium staff has an agenda. When I look at categories to follow, “diversity” is the second category visible, and they suggested to me based upon my history here at medium a publication that is for gay man. I’ve written zero about gay men, and to my knowledge, I’ve read nothing that has that as a central issue either. I wonder how often you get recommended — someone who consistently writes at a high standard on current issues. I can’t think of anyone I have followed through a recommend, as most are either from seeing interactions between people I follow, or seeing who liked what and then seeing that content.
